question: 淡い
sourceMnemonic: This is a single kanji with an <ja>い</ja> on the end, meaning you know it's probably an adjective. What's the adjective form of <kanji>faint</kanji>? It's <vocabulary>faint</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You look at the distance. You see something very <vocabulary>faint</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>pale</vocabulary> out there. It's... it's... <reading>awwwa</reading> (<ja>あわ</ja>) a puppy! Awwwww! Aawwww!
